short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buyer Tab - Brings you the best shopping websites in the world

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buyer is a new tab extension, that brings you the best shopping websites in the world.

With Buyer you have access to the newest products and best price offers out there.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the buyer tab Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 
Newtab search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.
